snippet.title: My Little Pony: A Maretime Bay Adventure - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
To all My Little Pony fans, we have great news! Soon you can embark on an epic adventure set in Maretime Bay, and help the ponies in their dream to make the world a better place by bringing magic and harmony back to their community. 

My Little Pony: A Maretime Bay Adventure is coming soon to all platforms! 

Follow us on:
Web: https://www.bandainamcoent.eu
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcoeu
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Bandainamcoeu 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bandainamcoeu

#MyLittlePony #AMaretimeBayAdventure
